verses.name: Jeremiah 4:10
verses.text: Then said I, Ah, Lord God! surely thou hast greatly deceived this people and Jerusalem, saying, Ye shall have peace; whereas the sword reacheth unto the soul.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:11
verses.text: At that time shall it be said to this people and to Jerusalem, A dry wind of the high places in the wilderness toward the daughter of my people, not to fan, nor to cleanse,

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:12
verses.text: Even a full wind from those places shall come unto me: now also will I give sentence against them.
